org.libav

Class DefaultMediaEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.libav.DefaultMediaEncoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMediaEncoder

    public class DefaultMediaEncoder
extends Object
implements IMediaEncoder
    Default implementation of the media encoder interface.
    Author:
    Ondrej Perutka
